expo.name: Recycle-It!
expo.description: Uses Image Recognition to determine if and where an item is recyclable.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Your location is used to show local recycling locations and to find directions to them.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Your photos are used for recycling image recognition.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Your camera is used for recycling image recognition.
